title: logging into client
body: so i play a few games with some friends, get off, go eat food, come back an hour later and i'm unable to login for some reason. i get the message "error connecting to login que." my internet is fine, i'm still in discord, still have youtube playing as i always do when i play league. i tried reverting to the old client hoping that would solve my issue, it did not. the old client gives me the "did not receive response from server."

replies.body:
Your internet can be in perfect condition but sometimes your network can still have issues talking to specific servers for one reason or another. Since the client is telling you that it couldn't connect to our login queue, there's a good chance that something is blocking your network from reaching our servers. 

Look over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can push that connection through and get you back on the Rift!
